comment.body: @猫叉酱（小号）: additionally there is the possibility of pushing over tor, combined with the possibility for abuse by creating 1000's of accounts.

@Pexo: Technically, I think it's done by the hubs that you are connected to.  But if you are connected to all of the hubs then you get 100%.  The reason it full decentralization, you either have parts or the whole... If you work with parts things can get 'forgotten', freenet has that problem.
In all honestly it was a cool idea, but i'm going to be glad its gone. The flooding of bots into the keybase system was really bad.
